title: Mercvry, or, The secret and svvift messenger shewing, how a man may with privacy and speed communicate his thoughts to a friend at any distance.
author: Wilkins, John, 1614-1672.
publisher: Printed by I. Norton, for Iohn Maynard and Timothy Wilkins ...,
notes: Commendatory poems by Sir Francis Kynaston and others.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
